title: Rilke Entity Options Schema
description: Creates a new, generic entity definition in the given or default project.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the entity?

storeName.x-prompt: What store name would you like to use for the entity?

path.description: The path at which to create the store, relative to the workspace root.

flat.description: When true, creates files at the top level of the project.

ready.description: When true, creates files with ready made code.
